Claim: "A man in black plays the harmonica."
Referring expressions: Man in black, harmonica  Man, harmonica
Formula: (exists a (exists b (IsInBlack(b) and PlaysHarmonica(a))) & (forall d (  PlaysHarmonica(d) ->  IsPlayingHarmonica(d))) & (forall e ( IsPlayingHarmonica(e) ->   PlaysHarmonica(e)))) -> (exists a (IsPlayingHarmonica(a)))
